pers00292.desc: Scottish writer, poet, translator, and politician (1736-1796)

bibl.title: Fragments of ancient poetry, collected in the Highlands of Scotland, and translated from the Galic or Erse language..
Fingal, an ancient epic poem. : In six books: together with several other poems, composed by Ossian the son of Fingal. / Translated from the Galic language, by James Macpherson..
Temora, an ancient epic poem, in eight books: : together with several other poems, composed by Ossian, the son of Fingal. / Translated from the Galic language, by James Macpherson..
The works of Ossian, the son of Fingal / translated from the Galic language by James Macpherson
